attributes.action: To have a therapeutic thinking approach course at school.
attributes.additional_details:
Look at the survey below which explained three-quarters of teachers left teaching due to pupils' behaviour:
https://www.independent.co.uk/news/education/education-news/bad-behaviour-classroom-teachers-quit-childrens-education-disruption-a8685851.html
attributes.background: It has been one of the reasons that teachers have left teaching, please sign the petition:  'We will need to have a therapeutic thinking approach course at school for pupils or students who have been disruptive, rude and misbehaved towards teachers.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure if you want the Government to add content to the national curriculum, or implement changes to behaviour and discipline policy in schools, or do something else.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Create a statutory behaviour and discipline policy that applies to all schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636908

We have removed the link to the video you included in your petition, because this contained footage of identifiable children.
